        Overrides:

      • startTimer

        public void startTimer()

      • startMoving

        public void startMoving()
        Enables moving mode. Sets it so that clicking and dragging will navigate around the grid.

      • updateMove

        public void updateMove(java.awt.Point now)
        Called by the MouseListener. Updates the current offset by comparing the current mouse location and the location of the last checked mouse location. Does nothing if currently not in moving mode.
        Parameters:
        now - the current location of the mouse

      • updateZoom

        public void updateZoom(int wheelRotation)
        Updates the zoom. Called by the MouseWheelListener. Adjusts the Viewport offset so that the point underneath the mouse remains centered.
        Parameters:
        wheelRotation - the mouse wheel increment

      • stopMoving

        public void stopMoving()
        Disables moving mode. Sets it so that clicking won't navigate around the grid.

      • inputKey

        public void inputKey(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)

      • mouseToGridLocation

        public java.awt.Point mouseToGridLocation(java.awt.Point p)
        Converts the specified point on the screen for this Viewport to coordinates on the Spacetime grid. This method takes into account the Viewport's zoom and offset.
        Parameters:
        p - the screen coordinates to be converted
        Returns:
        the space-time grid coordinates

      • gridToMouseLocation

        public java.awt.Point gridToMouseLocation(java.awt.Point p)
        Converts the specified point on the space-time grid to coordinates on the Viewport screen. This method takes into account the Viewport's zoom and offset.
        Parameters:
        p -
        Returns:
